systems.label: TaskSystem
systems.name: TaskSystem
abi: event TaskCreated(uint256 indexed taskId, address indexed creator, address indexed assignee, string description, uint256 deadline, uint256 timestamp)
event TaskUpdated(uint256 indexed taskId, address newAssignee, string newDescription, uint256 newDeadline)
function createTask(address assignee, string description, uint256 deadline) returns (uint256 taskId)
worldAbi: event TaskCreated(uint256 indexed taskId, address indexed creator, address indexed assignee, string description, uint256 deadline, uint256 timestamp)
event TaskUpdated(uint256 indexed taskId, address newAssignee, string newDescription, uint256 newDeadline)
function TASK__createTask(address assignee, string description, uint256 deadline) returns (uint256 taskId)
